document.heading: Home and Community Juvenile Probation Supervision Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-258, the “Home and Community Juvenile Probation Supervision Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-596. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 1, 1998, and December 15, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 31, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-610 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-258 became effective April 20, 1999.
